de.sub.goobi.metadaten.copier

Class MetadataSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.sub.goobi.metadaten.copier.DataSelector
      • de.sub.goobi.metadaten.copier.MetadataSelector
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalMetadataSelector, MetadataPathSelector

    public abstract class MetadataSelector
extends DataSelector
    Abstract base class that different types of metadata selectors are based on. Proviedes a factory method to create its subclasses depending on a a given String path, and defines methods that shall be implemented by the implementing metadata selectors.
    Author:
    Matthias Ronge <matthias.ronge@zeutschel.de>

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class de.sub.goobi.metadaten.copier.DataSelector

        LAST_CHILD_QUANTIFIER, METADATA_PATH_SEPARATOR, METADATA_SEPARATOR, RESPECTIVE_DESTINATION_REFERENCE, VARIABLE_REFERENCE

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static MetadataSelector create(String path)
      Factory method to create a metadata selector.
      protected abstract void createIfPathExistsOnly(CopierData data, ugh.dl.DocStruct logicalNode, String value)
      Calling createIfPathExistsOnly() on the implementing instance should check if the document structure node the metadata selector is pointing at is available, but no metadata as named by the path is available at that document structure node, and only in this case add a metadata as named by the path with the value passed to the function.
      void createIfPathExistsOnly(CopierData data, String value)
      Checks if the document structure node the metadata selector is pointing at is available, but no metadata as named by the path is available at that document structure node, and only in this case adds a metadata as named by the path with the value passed to the function.
      protected abstract void createOrOverwrite(CopierData data, ugh.dl.DocStruct logicalNode, String value)
      Calling createOrOverwrite() on the implementing instance should check if the document structure node as named by the path is available, and set the metadata as named by the path to the value passed to the function.
      void createOrOverwrite(CopierData data, String value)
      Checks if the document structure node as named by the path is available, and sets the metadata as named by the path to the value passed to the function.
      Iterable<MetadataSelector> findAll(CopierData data)
      Returns all concrete metadata selectors the potentially generic metadata selector expression resolves to.
      protected abstract Iterable<MetadataSelector> findAll(ugh.dl.DocStruct logicalNode)
      Must be implemented to return all concrete metadata selectors the potentially generic metadata selector expression resolves to.
      String findIn(CopierData data)
      Returns the value of the metadata named by the path used to construct the metadata selector, or null if either the path or the metadata at the end of the path aren’t available.
      protected abstract String findIn(ugh.dl.DocStruct logicalNode)
      Calling findIn() on the implementing instance should return the value of the metadata named by the path used to construct the metadata selector.

        public MetadataSelector()

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static MetadataSelector create(String path)
                               throws org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException
        Factory method to create a metadata selector. Depending on the path, the required implementation will be constructed.
        Parameters:
        path - path to create a metadata selector from.
        Returns:
        a metadata selector instance representing the given paht
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException - if the path cannot be evaluated

      • createIfPathExistsOnly

        protected abstract void createIfPathExistsOnly(CopierData data,
                                               ugh.dl.DocStruct logicalNode,
                                               String value)
        Calling createIfPathExistsOnly() on the implementing instance should check if the document structure node the metadata selector is pointing at is available, but no metadata as named by the path is available at that document structure node, and only in this case add a metadata as named by the path with the value passed to the function.
        Parameters:
        data - data to work on
        logicalNode - document structure node to start from, intended for recursion
        value - value to write if no metadatum is available at the path’s end
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if the operation fails for unfulfilled dependencies

      • createIfPathExistsOnly

        public void createIfPathExistsOnly(CopierData data,
                                   String value)
        Checks if the document structure node the metadata selector is pointing at is available, but no metadata as named by the path is available at that document structure node, and only in this case adds a metadata as named by the path with the value passed to the function.
        Parameters:
        data - data to work on
        value - value to write if no metadata is available at the path’s end
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if the operation fails for unfulfilled dependencies

      • createOrOverwrite

        protected abstract void createOrOverwrite(CopierData data,
                                          ugh.dl.DocStruct logicalNode,
                                          String value)
        Calling createOrOverwrite() on the implementing instance should check if the document structure node as named by the path is available, and set the metadata as named by the path to the value passed to the function. If the document structure node isn’t yet present, it should be created. If the metadata already exists, it shall be overwritten, otherwise it shall be created.
        Parameters:
        data - data to work on
        logicalNode - document structure node to start from, intended for recursion
        value - value to write if no metadatum is available at the path’s end
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if the operation fails for unfulfilled dependencies

      • createOrOverwrite

        public void createOrOverwrite(CopierData data,
                              String value)
        Checks if the document structure node as named by the path is available, and sets the metadata as named by the path to the value passed to the function. If the document structure node isn’t yet present, it will be created. If the metadata already exists, it will be overwritten, otherwise it will be created.
        Parameters:
        data - data to work on
        value - value to write if no metadatum is available at the path’s end
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if the operation fails for unfulfilled dependencies

      • findAll

        public Iterable<MetadataSelector> findAll(CopierData data)
        Returns all concrete metadata selectors the potentially generic metadata selector expression resolves to.
        Parameters:
        data - copier data to work on
        Returns:
        all metadata selectors the expression resolves to

      • findAll

        protected abstract Iterable<MetadataSelector> findAll(ugh.dl.DocStruct logicalNode)
        Must be implemented to return all concrete metadata selectors the potentially generic metadata selector expression resolves to.
        Parameters:
        logicalNode - Node of the logical document structure to work on
        Returns:
        all metadata selectors the expression resolves to

      • findIn

        public String findIn(CopierData data)
        Returns the value of the metadata named by the path used to construct the metadata selector, or null if either the path or the metadata at the end of the path aren’t available.
        Specified by:
        findIn in class DataSelector
        Parameters:
        data - data collection to locate the metadata in
        Returns:
        the value the path points to, or null if absent
        See Also:
        DataSelector.findIn(de.sub.goobi.metadaten.copier.CopierData)

      • findIn

        protected abstract String findIn(ugh.dl.DocStruct logicalNode)
        Calling findIn() on the implementing instance should return the value of the metadata named by the path used to construct the metadata selector. Should return null if either the path or the metadata at the end of the path aren’t available.
        Parameters:
        logicalNode - document structure node to examine, intended for recursion
        Returns:
        the value the path points to, or null if absent
